inference: The graph passes through the point $(0,-2),$ so $a \sin (b \cdot 0) = -2.$  This means $a \sin 0 = -2,$ so $a = \boxed{-2}.$  I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: The maximum value of $a \sin bx$ is $|a|,$ so $a = \boxed{-2}.$
